html:
8.22.22  10:55 am   would you rather drink water or holy water?

      as long as it's clean then it's holy enough for me

8.22.22  10:47 am   Cat

      i understand

8.22.22  9:44 am   can you ignore this question? 

      i'll see what i can do

8.22.22  3:37 am   Hi there! I have some questions about your music. Your style seems to be moderately absurdist and surreal, but I've really seen nothing like it. I won't ask you to define your style because that's difficult and restrictive, but I was wondering how you developed it?

     basically i'm just doing things any way i can. or can't

      And also if you ever wanted to tell a more long form story?

     yes

      And what medium would you use music or animations or something else.

     voice, animations, and music

     
I hope you are doing well. Your music is really wonderful

8.21.22  11:18 pm   what drove you to get into music?

      the thing that continues to drive me to music is music. i don't remember the first time this happened, but it continues to happen on a regular basis, in new ways

8.21.22  7:51 pm   Can you right a song about the meaning of life? If anyone can do it it's you. 

      all my songs are about that, whether i like it or not

8.21.22  6:56 pm   Do you do your drums/percussion tracks first on any of your songs?

     yes but it probably wouldn't be the one that stays on the final

     What's the first track or instrument you usually lay out first to get things going?

     probably some perc, but the first thing that will remain would usually be the vocal. actually nevermind, i realize you could take it another step back and it turns out there's actually a room recording of voice/keyboard during the writing process which goes in before anything. but that gets removed before the temp insts go in, which then get removed as soon as the final vocal goes in

8.21.22  6:43 pm   have you ever tried camera tracking

      it was on my to do list but for now the point is moot

8.21.22  5:51 pm   Do you like Mondays?

      yes, but not as much as all the other days combined

8.21.22  4:08 pm   what positive life altering thing should i do next?

     answer the door

8.21.22  4:01 pm   first year of high school. any advice?

      climb as high as you can. next year gets even higher

8.21.22  2:30 pm   i bought special sandals so i could take them off, thus begin to fly around. however, upon delivery, the special sandals only let me fly when i had them on, going against you had stated in one of your musical infomercials. what do you have to say about this?

      fake

8.21.22  11:04 am   "I get turned on by the news" you cannot tell me that that was not intentional

      well, by the same token, i'd suppose YOU could not tell me that THAT was not intentional

8.21.22  5:06 am   why am i here

      by definition. 'here' means 'where i am', which when you say it translates to where you are

8.21.22  2:57 am   Do you like music?

      no. it's too powerful

8.21.22  2:36 am   when you perform live, will you use a bottomless mic stand like freddie mercury

      i don't see why not

8.21.22  2:14 am   do you have a bucket list?

      no. i only have like 1 bucket

8.21.22  1:25 am   tell me a joke

      there's no such thing as a joke

8.21.22  1:06 am   what's your opinion on frowning?

      you may be pleased to find out that the frown is an expression of happiness

8.21.22  1:04 am   Whats your hot take on hot takes

      fake

8.21.22  1:04 am   Whats your hot take on hot takes

      none. didn't happen

8.20.22  11:39 pm   im not having a good time at college

      are you a teacher or a student

8.20.22  7:26 pm   What are doldrums?

      a springboard, toward brighterdom

8.20.22  6:39 pm   favorite beatles moment?

      april 4, 1964

8.20.22  6:38 pm   have you eaten pizza?

      i have studied it very closely. that much i cannot deny

8.20.22  5:43 pm   do you enjoy math

      yes

8.20.22  12:21 pm   have you ever taken a fan suggestion for a video?

      no

8.20.22  11:10 am   How do you feel when you can answer two different questions in a row with the exact same answer?

      resourceful

8.20.22  11:01 am   I watched every reality video are you ever going to post more?

      yes

8.20.22  10:18 am   opinion on brazilian zebras

      i assume they are green

8.20.22  9:40 am   how bad is it that ive been playing/making music for over 10 years but still cant read notation

      how many times have you lost a gig for that reason

8.20.22  9:24 am   when you see/type with LeTtErs lIkE tHiS  what sort of intonation do you visualize 

      colorful

8.20.22  8:54 am   i'm writing a book, what should it be about

      everything. all books are about everything

8.20.22  8:26 am   what the heck is a

      both a letter and a word, or possibly even a number

8.20.22  8:22 am   I have the impression that your song "Meet me in September" announces a tour/live show in the United States that will start in September, did I misinterpret?

      yes

8.20.22  7:42 am   was / is it hard to find yourself

      yes. the hardest part is remembering how easy it is

8.20.22  7:05 am   What makes a wall a wall

      you may have to do it

8.20.22  4:51 am   do you understand quantum mechanics?

      i don't know the details, but i think i see what it's getting at

8.20.22  4:14 am   I'm trying to learn how to add chords under a melody, and thought I'd start with just adding a single bass note to make it easier for myself. Is there a more efficient method than just going through all 12 notes by trial-and-error and picking one that sounds good though?

      if you get some song books, that will probably be pretty enjoyable, and you'll catch on to some basic things pretty quickly. after you go through all the songs in the book you'll probably be able to figure out songs that are not in the book

8.20.22  2:46 am   why did you make a "ugh" sound after the line "I GOT FRIENDS they're pretty friendly"? could there be a deeper meaning to this that I am too lazy to figure out? 

      i think the groove got so friendly so quickly, it became almost nauseating

8.20.22  1:30 am   what is your opinion about rubik's cubes?

      you must make it into a sphere, as rubik intended

8.20.22  12:47 am   I've noticed you talk about prime factorization quite a bit. Are you secretly a math nerd?

      openly

8.19.22  11:38 pm   help, i started singing to myself out of boredom and now i can't stop

      this is good for you

8.19.22  9:28 pm   Im going to graduate highschool this year. What should i do during my senior year??

      see how high the school goes. climb the school

8.19.22  8:54 pm   do you have any tips on how to play against the queens gambit with black?

      how about the slav defense

8.19.22  7:57 pm   what is an example of rough clothing vs soft clothing?

      there are no examples of rough or soft clothing

8.19.22  5:53 pm   whenever i listen to music I like (invcluding some of yours), i feel super discouraged to make my own, and it makes me feel that ill never be good enough. how can i get past this because its really meddling with my soul and identity 

      i'm generally going through the same thing, even without listening to any other music

8.19.22  5:29 pm   why won't NASA let me observe the rest of the universe?

      it's not here yet. they can't see it either

8.19.22  4:26 pm   Any advice for writing a melody?

      imagine a location. any location, real or false. what's the first thing that happens there, or the first thing you notice? (sing it)

8.19.22  2:48 pm   have you ever eaten a raspberry,

     i don't think so

     and if so, what was that like
